Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood. - Marie Curie
Today you are you. That is truer than true. There is no one alive who is you-er than you! - Dr Seuss
It is better to light one candle than to curse the darkness. - Chinese Proverb
One kind word can warm three winter months. - Japanese Proverb
Walking is our best medicine. -  Hippocrates
A loving heart is the truest wisdom. - Charles Dickens
Fall seven times, stand up eight. - Japanese Proverb
Imagination is more important than knowledge. -  Albert Einstein
I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work. - Thomas Edison
Pace yourself... an elephant can be swallowed, one bite at a time.
The time is always right to do what is right. - Martin Luther King Jr.
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work. - Thomas Edison
If you judge people, you have no time to love them. - Mother Teresa
The future depends on what we do in the present. - Mahatma Gandhi
Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new. - Albert Einstein
Never, never, never give up. - Winston Churchill
The best things in life aren't things. - Art Buchwald
Never look down on anybody, unless you are going to help them up. - Rev. Jesse Jackson
I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear. - Martin Luther King, Jr.
The beginning of knowledge is the discovery of something we do not understand. - Frank Herbert
Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow' - M.A. Radmacher
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant. - Robert Louis Stevenson
Wrinkles merely indicate where smiles have been. - Mark Twain
